project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the terminal output to display weather information in a user-friendly format
Write tests for the weather fetching and parsing functions
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure correct functionality
